vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play (patch_1.sol#80-101) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (patch_1.sol#1): it allows old versions
